testsuite.name: AppTest

testcase.name: rootTest

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Expecting: <" Vowel Word Game

Vowel Word Game

Create a word puzzle to solve by typing a word/phrase and clicking play to replace vowels with the dash symbol "-". The resulting word puzzle will be on the next page so that another person can try and guess it.



"> to contain: <"Create a word puzzles">
